projects.title: Leveraging GraphSAGE for Location-Based Sales Analysis in F&B Franchises
projects.description: Developed a GraphSAGE-based sales prediction model for F&B franchises, reducing RMSE by 10.6% compared to manual expert predictions. To operationalize the model, I built a full-stack web service using React and FastAPI, allowing internal experts to easily access and interact with the results. I was responsible for both the machine learning pipeline and the frontend interface, ensuring seamless integration between prediction logic and user experience.

projects.title: Comparative Topic Network Analysis: Pre-GPT Era vs. GPT Era Prompts
projects.description:
Analyzed the evolution of topic networks in AI research before and after GPT's emergence.

Built network analysis pipeline using Python

Visualized topic clusters and their evolution

Identified key shifts in research focus

projects.title: VENETA Multi-Issuer Blockchain System
projects.description:
Designed and developed MVP for blockchain-based P2P trading system.

- Selected for government-sponsored Financial Regulatory Sandbox
- Implemented smart contracts for P2P trading
- Filed patent for novel consensus mechanism

projects.title: DEATH's WORD CHAIN Game
projects.description:
Interactive vocabulary learning game developed while studying GRE words.

- Built with React and TypeScript
- Features 5000+ GRE vocabulary words
- Includes spaced repetition algorithm
